flavour_base_unit_check.name: flavour_base_unit_check
flavour_base_unit_check.value: (base_unit)::text = ANY (ARRAY[('g/kg'::character varying)::text, ('%(v/v)'::character varying)::text, ('g/L'::character varying)::text, ('mL/L'::character varying)::text, ('ppm'::character varying)::text])
